meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of January 11, 2024 Charter Review Commission Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Submitted Amendments Recommended for Exclusion
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amendments recommended for exclusion.

agenda_items.title: Delete section allowing urban conservation programs
agenda_items.description: Delete the section allowing the city council to provide urban conservation, rehabilitation, and redevelopment programs.

agenda_items.title: Rename Zoning Commission
agenda_items.description: Rename the Zoning Commission to the City Plan and Zoning Commission and adjust membership requirements.

agenda_items.title: Amend process for appointing plan commission members
agenda_items.description: Amend the process for appointing the chair and members of the plan commission.

agenda_items.title: Allow boards and commissions to elect vice chairs
agenda_items.description: Allow city boards and commissions to elect their own vice chairs.

agenda_items.title: Remove Thoroughfare Plan requirement
agenda_items.description: Remove the requirement to have a Thoroughfare Plan.

agenda_items.title: Amend language for City Secretary's hiring ability
agenda_items.description: Amend language to allow the City Secretary to hire all staff within their office.

agenda_items.title: Delete requirement for assistant city attorneys
agenda_items.description: Delete the requirement that all assistant city attorneys shall devote their entire time to the service of the city.

agenda_items.title: Delete provisions for opening and inspection of bids
agenda_items.description: Delete provisions pertaining to the procedures for the opening and public inspection of bids.

agenda_items.title: Abolish Mayor Pro Tem and Deputy Mayor Pro Tem positions
agenda_items.description: Abolish or amend the appointment process of the Mayor Pro Tem and Deputy Mayor Pro Tem positions.
